goal.ch: “- 地震紀錄及工程地震上之應用- 地震及強地動之基礎概念- 地震危害分析及其應用- 地震危害分析實作“
goal.en: “- Learning earthquake records and their applications for engineering purpose- Understanding factors of earthquake and strong ground motion- Introducing seismic hazard assessments and its applications- Assessing seismic hazard assessment practically“

outline.ch: “- 地震危害分析及課程介紹- 地震規模及震度- 地震紀錄：歷史文獻紀錄及儀器紀錄- 孕震構造- 最大地震規模- 強地動評估- 定值式與概率式地震危害分析- 利用「OPENQUAKE」程式計算地震危害“
outline.en: “- An introduction of seismic hazard assessment- Magnitude and intensity scales- Seismic records: historical and instrumental records- Seismotetonic sources- The maximum magnitudes of earthquakes- Earthquake strong ground motion- Deterministic and probabilistic seismic hazard assessments- Seismic hazard assessment through the ‘OPENQUAKE’ software“

ch.competencies: 進階數理及專業知識能力
觀測模擬及分析推理能力
國際視野與語文溝通能力
專業倫理及服務學習之能力
電腦及程式語言應用能力

en.competencies: Advanced mathematical and professional knowledge and ability
Observation simulation and analysis of reasoning ability
International perspective and language communication skills
